title: Chasing Butterflies
description: Struggling to deal with the break down of her relationship, Lorilei Williams faces an even bigger challenge when she is diagnosed with breast cancer.As Lorilei does her best to cope, she finds an unexpected friend in Lukas Bray, her employer of five years, and discovers an inner strength she never knew existed.As one relationship breaks down and Lorilei ponders whether anyone will love her with the new scars that grace her body, she finds that Lukas is there for her throughout her journey.If you believe in love, or ever had your heart broken, you will find yourself lost in this story, as Lorilei matures into a strong young woman, and finds that love can remain a part of her life.
author: Josephine Brierley
